lead_paragraph: Tired of being harassed by lawless oilworkers in the area, the citizens of a small town in California turn to a Vietnam veteran for help. Other veterans join him and they do bring order to the town, but eventually the group of vigilantes take over control and have to be removed before life can get back to normal.
